OCR Functions

Source: R/ocr.R
perform_ocr.Rd

Functions for performing OCR on PDF documents Perform OCR on PDF

Usage

perform_ocr(pdf_file, max_wait_seconds = 60)

Arguments

pdf_file

Path to PDF

max_wait_seconds

Maximum seconds to wait for OCR completion (default: 60)

Value

List with markdown content, images, and raw result

On this page

Developed by Nathan C Layman.

list(text = “EcoExtract - Structured ecological data extraction from scientific literature”)
